name: Comdisco
overview: Comdisco, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides equipment leasing, continuity, managed network services, and desktop management solutions. The company provides new and used computer equipment; non-computer equipment, such as office equipment, PBX, point-of-sale, and other technology equipment; healthcare; communications; semiconductor manufacturing; and other industry specific equipment leasing, remarketing, and other services. It also offers venture leases, venture debt, and direct equity financing to venture capital-backed companies. In addition, Comdisco, Inc. provides disaster recovery and contingency planning services. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Rosemont, Illinois. Comdisco, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Comdisco Holding Co., Inc.

funding_round.source_description: Veraz, a VoIP equipment provider, raises $10M more before IPO
